name: GHOSTLY CAVERN
description:
GHOSTLY CAVERN

made for the one button jam.

escape a cavern with a jet pack while evading a ghost, you can also try collecting coins scattered about.

first release in a while, kind of bad development but alright. i feel like there was a mobile game that did this kinda game before but i cannot remember it.

graphics use the en4 color palette by ENDESGA

enjoy.
